comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on November 02, 2023, 01:26:54 PMI can do all the work that needs to be done. I am waiting for an answer from youYou can't do all the work that's needed to be done because it's literally impossible for a human to do all the needed work. There are many fields which require educational background and experience and everyone can't just do those type of work. The only work you can do is the skills that you have acquired either via video tutorials or via practicing those yourself.It will be better if you share some of the skills that you have and you should also try to share some samples of your previous work so that the client may pay you for your services. If you are good at programming then surely you may get programming related work and if you are good at writing then you may get clients who are looking for writers. Additionally, you can also try your luck at freelancing sites as there are so many clients who want to have their work done by a freelancer. There's literally need of work in every field but they need only those workers who have the skills to do the work according to their specifications.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I am sorry to tell you that your post or topic here is not in tandem with the reality. You can not tell me that you can do everything at the same time. Do you want to tell me now that you have all the skills required to do everything here. It can not be possible that you could do everything as it relates to work here because you can not tell me that you can be a developer, Web designer, programmer etc. all of these at the same time. Let us be realistic,  it is not possible to do everything even genus are fully specialised in a particular field were they can excel properly without mixing up any things for themselves. Nevertheless, you do not sound convincing from your post as it lacks facts. You have no portfolio, no past experience and you are a newbie that has not yet seen the four falls of the platform. I would advise that you put up these items I have mentioned if you are really looking at working here. People who hire job here do nothing but looking into your portfolio and past performance to know Your work skills before getting you on their team and if not nobody would see you as first impression matters here.

comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on November 02, 2023, 01:26:54 PMI can do all the work that needs to be done. I am waiting for an answer from youThis isn't the way to ask job from the potential clients or employers from the forum. You should incident what you can do, what skills you have and how much you're asking for. comments.author: Text
comments.body: Instead of asking for a job to offer you, why not look for jobs that you can apply for, I think that would be the better approach. You need to provide more details like highlighting your skills and experiences for you to find the relevant job you’re seeking, and showcase them. Employers can’t guess what you can do though, they don’t have any idea what kind of you’re interested in. If you have any specific jobs in mind, you should let them know and you are allowing them to match you with the right job opportunities.Have you already searched other platforms like LinkedIn, Indeed, and Glassdoor? You can search there for job openings that can match your skills and interests.
